knimeNode.name: PDB Connector XML Query Builder
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is no longer functional due to the shutdown of the remote webservices

p.b: This node is no longer functional due to the shutdown of the remote webservices - Please use the new 'PDB Connector Query Builder' node instead

intro.p: The PDB Connector XML Query Builder node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) , based on the original PDB Connector node developed by Enspiral Discovery in collaboration with Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

ports.outPort: Flow variable containing the PDB Advanced query XML String

views.view: A view of the combined XML Query
A 'logical' view of the combined Query
